metadata.title: CVE-2020-35511 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A global buffer overflow was discovered in pngcheck function inpngcheck-2.4.0(5 patches applied) via a crafted png file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35511` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pngcheck - 2.3.0-7ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pngcheck package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-7ubuntu0.20.04.1').
